title: Kidnapping Inc.
overview: A group of kidnappers take the son of a wealthy presidential candidate in Haiti. Doc and Zoe are two amateur gangsters tasked with delivering the young man to their ruthless boss. With a hitman on their trail, Zoe accidentally kills the hostage. Panicked, Doc and Zoe come across Patrick and his very pregnant wife Laura. Patrick looks exactly like the senatorâ€™s dead son. Doc and Zoe decide to abduct the couple and replace the candidate's son with Patrick.
